title: Experience Reflection Learning Program for Strengthening Science-Related Work Competencies in University-Based Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Integrating learners' science-related job experiences with university education to suggest organizational capacity-building directions

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze work experiences to derive insights applicable to scientific research/development processes.
Learners can write reflective reports connecting university theoretical learning with field experiences.
Learners can propose university-industry collaboration strategies to strengthen organizational capabilities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
